Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Renovation disruptive
Positive_Review: Room clean and comfortable Concierge staff very good They reserved a 3 hour drive around city with my handicapped guest Driver wonderful This location near to museum can t be beat Two great days worth trip from London on Eurostar

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Metro is underneath shaking the room a bit at night Rest is really great Phantastic location to explore Paris Lots of stuff in walking distance Metro station 50m away Very good breakfast buffet
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The staff was unfriendly and the hotel is in desperate need of repairs Our room had rotted wood on the doors and windows The A C did not work There was mold in the shower tub Definitely would never stay again
Positive_Review: Not much

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Their was renovation work going on so the bar was closed There was no fitness centre I was told there was a gym but if I wanted more than that I would need to go to a local Health Spa etc
Positive_Review: Great room Great location Comfortable bed Helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff was amazing I did not run into any staff member that didn t go above and beyond to provide fabulous service The food was wonderful and we ate there everyday on our short trip We felt like we were the only ones in the place even though it was packed

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Could not check in early had to change in a very small public toilet Rooms tired and shabby more 3 star Price unjustified
Positive_Review: Location staff omelett breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Old glory everywhere shabby carpets and furniture bath mixer brings unpredictable hot cold water supply temperature balance and so on and so forth so if you a picky to have a 5 star comfort of the nowadays probably you can find better place for 400 EUR night Room service didn t cared about tea cups in the room the rest was fine Interesting to visit after renovation
Positive_Review: Location unforgettably hard to beat Exceptionally friendly and welcoming staff Good restaurant Good breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Some areas not available due to renovations bar area Rooms very warm but could open windows
Positive_Review: Fantastic location friendly staff good size room and bathroom lovely breakfast Decent fitness facilities

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Nice hotel amazing location walkable to most attractions Staff really helpfully and friendly lady on reception Charlotte made my wife and I feel very comfortably

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Was very expensive but similar inferior hotels in my opinion were priced v similarly close to further away from the centre of town
Positive_Review: The breakfast was really great lots of choice the staff were very helpful welcoming the location is excellent the decor ambience had the feel of traditional Parisian bygone era

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The only problem I faced was a concierge attendant who was a little bit unfriendly with me as far as I have asked to organize a transfer for me and he behaved as it was not really his business I don t remember his name however he served on Saturday 19 11 2016 in the evening Additionally during my first day of staying at the hotel I have found somebody s hair in my bathroom right after checking in the room Anyway these factors didn t spoil my stay at all
Positive_Review: Hotel s staff was very friendly indeed Breakfasts are amazing with the freshest bakery and croissants Fell in love with them If I visit Paris once again I will definitely stay at this hotel avoiding choosing other options

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The breakfast could be a bit more exiting and the information regarding the additional items on the menu from the kitchen more clear There is a obvious need for renovation but everything is clean and funcutional
Positive_Review: The service was impeccable and the location perfect

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The room was fine but the shower in particular was not easily accessible
Positive_Review: We enjoyed the location more than anything Close to the Louvre Museum the Metro Station restaurants etc Personnel were very amicable and helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: There was nothing we didn t like Absolutely without fault
Positive_Review: We checked into the Hyatt Hotel du Louvre after our wedding It s a fantastic location the staff were very helpful friendly and professional We were given a bottle of wine a cheese selection and macaroons on arrival even though we arrived late at 11pm Full breakfast was included and it was very good with a wide selection of food and drinks The room was spacious with a sitting lounge room large and very comfortable bedroom and large bathroom The view from the balcony doors was also a notable feature

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The hotel is a bit aged and rooms are a little dark TV is small and the facilities are a bit poor
Positive_Review: The location is perfect Located just a minute walk from The Lourve and 5 minutes away from Beautiful Les Halles and Luxury Rue Saint Honore This place is convenient and perfect for any busy traveller

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel staff were genuinely courteous and gracious Our room was beautiful and the concierge gave excellent advice Will return without a doubt

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Hotel looks old and outdated with worn carpets dark halls and old furniture in room Price is very high for such an old venue
Positive_Review: Very good staff location is great service

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: A big negative was the lack of coffee making facilities in rooms Not even a room we could access other than the breakfast room
Positive_Review: For Paris the room was a reasonable size and price The night consierrge was extremely helpful and resolved a small problem very promptly We primarily chose this hotel because of its location and it delivered in spades

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: some rooms may be due for maintenance upgrade
Positive_Review: The helpful and friendly staff the superb central location within walking distance of the major attractions and the spacious room size

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Being there for seven nights and have our breakfast at the hotel the variety of the food was limited but the personal was very attentive
Positive_Review: Extra thanks to Florence Ramon who helped us in every aspect plus from the second day upgraded us to a nice room with view

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: WiFi signal too weak shame for 5 hotel Luckily from our suit on 5th floor we could get WIFI signal from nearest Cafe
Positive_Review: Good Location and professional staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The meals and the beverages in the restaurant and bar were very high I thought 21 Euros was extremely high for one drink
Positive_Review: The people who worked there were all extremely friendly and helpful They were great

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: It s great although I was told that it ll go through stage by stage of renovations in the coming months which could be a concern
Positive_Review: It s location is amazing Right in the mid of all the excitement although very touristy A very handy metro station within 30 seconds walk and plenty of great cafe s nearby Claus 5 min walk Staff are very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The polyester pillows suck Down pillows make all the difference for a comfortable sleep This beautiful old building needs some basic upkeep and attention
Positive_Review: We had a llarge corner room that looked out over the Louvre This location on the Right Bank can t be beat You are within minutes to all the wonderful sights and restaurants

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: With this price I expect a bigger space of room
Positive_Review: Perfect location 1 minute walk into Musee de Louvre and within 15 minutes walk to Musee d Orsay Very good shopping possibility Very historical facilities and style and very considerate service

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The ridiculous cost of the minibar and drinks in the bar You would sell a lot more if you priced these things at a reasonable price
Positive_Review: The Fragonard soaps ect are a very nice touch Plenty of English channels on the tv

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We got a really good deal for this hotel and when we arrived our room was upgraded from a standard room to a balcony room so it was excellent The hotel is old but the room is nice and comfortable We stayed for 4 nights The concierge is very helpful The location is VERY close to Louvre museum and the metro station This makes it even more convenient

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: A little problem is the suburban running under the Hotel ground If you are sensitive you feel it You should than book upper Floor
Positive_Review: Nice and big room Excellent feel well in historic place

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Has only one elevator that gets congested all the time room furniture is a bit dated absolutely zero available plugs to use for charging your stuff need to unplug lights
Positive_Review: Good location close proximity to all tourist attractions safe neighborhood clothes hanger heater in the bathroom nice cafe downstairs

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Shower It was either too cold or too hot There where stains on the walls in the bathroom and it was all kind of run down We stayed in the family room which was also expensive
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: There was one staff member who yelled at us for taking the side door with our stroller We didn t know it was kind of not okay because a staff member had previously shown it to us to facilitate our moving around Anyway she scowled at us and did not soften her displeasure with us
Positive_Review: The bed was definitely like a cloud The cleaning service came in twice a day which was lovely The location also just could not be beat as it was right next to the Louvre near a grocery store and several cafes and cute dining areas

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: toilets are separate from the bathroom and in another location in the room which is not very hygienic my room is on the fifth floor and which meant it was very old style dark red furniture which made it very dark
Positive_Review: The location is great The staff are very friendly

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The room size was quite small one room booked as with the view actually didn t have it Generally the hotel not quite linked by overall service level with Hyatt chain in other ones we stayed around the world service was higher Last but not the least one required interior renovation especially rooms doors extremely noise all the day from closing opening ones
Positive_Review: Location of the hotel is really nice near by to all most important areas in Paris clean and tidy rooms

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The place is falling apart and I found that this hotel is a long way from 5 star I was really very disappointed The air conditioning was on all night my bath ran away and the plug plunger came off in my hand of the sink
Positive_Review: The building and the location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Nothing we had a great trip
Positive_Review: We were greeted by Celine and Tamara at check in who upgraded us to a Suite when they found our we were celebrating our 33rd Wedding anniversary Room comfort was exceptional Hotel location excellent Staff were professional and friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No
Positive_Review: Staff is very nice we are going during my wife birthday and they have surprise cake and fruit juice in our room Also location is very good just only 1 min from hotel to metro

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The hotel is in a fabulous location but is badly in need of a renovation We would have given its current state a 3 5 4 star rating Having said that we would stay there again at a reduced rate just not with the higher expectations that we had had from their room pricing rating and photos
Positive_Review: The staff were helpful and friendly and went out of their way to ensure we enjoyed our stay there Because of them we did thank you all

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very helpful friendly staff Location great I m very fussy when it comes to cleanliness You didn t let me down My room was lovely and bed linen etc immaculate I will stay here again when in Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: See above
Positive_Review: The concierge desk added costs without informing me Ordering a cab for departure and telling me that I would be charged 7 Doris for their call eas not honest Charging an additional 5 euros for a ticket to the Louvre was not unacceptable but should have been divulged The front desk was much more obliging and helpful Paris needs American tourists and should be welcoming helpful and generous to those of us who are visiting despite the precarious conditions in France

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff were fantastic really helpful and always available I travelled here with my wife to celebrate her 40th birthday I had contacted the hotel beforehand about this and they couldn t have been any more accommodating with all of my requests From a room upgrade to a birthday cake and a bottle of wine on her birthday they made the stay an excellent one

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: There was no shower curtain in the bathroom Not sure if that s a European thing but every time we took a shower the floor was soaking wet
Positive_Review: Great location we had a huge room with a walk in closet and a little sitting area and king size bed Staff were very friendly

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: This hotel is due for a makeover I was told that this will happen starting in September It is in desperate need of this as the furniture doors and walls are scratched worn and broken It was comfortable but ready for a redo
Positive_Review: Our room was large but I had to upgrade the girls to a larger room The staff is amazing All were very friendly spoke excellent English and were extremely helpful with everything The location is fantastic

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Our room was on the top floor rather small but cozy Nothing we didn t like
Positive_Review: Staff were terrific and location can t be beat Walking distance or Metro from most everywhere Can t be better to look out the window and almost touch the Louvre Also hotel restaurant was recommended by concierges at other hotels

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: High priced even for Paris D cor in the rooms was outdated and did not seem correct to the period it was set in TV cuts itself on and off This was both tvs And it also did the same thing in our kid s rooms A C fan would also cut itself off and on in both ours and kids rooms
Positive_Review: Location Bathrooms were modern and beautiful and clean Very helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location Friendly staff Lovely bar area Car valet service was particularly pro active The bed was comfortable and then room was very large with lounge facilities However we were kept waiting for our room and not called when it was ready The room did not smell fresh and felt stripped down to the minimum No coffee facilities Payment needed to watch tv or use the internet other than wifi Probably more a 4 star hotel than 5

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Some minor renovation to correct a few shortcomings But just a few Leave the old atmosphere
Positive_Review: Location location Nice old hotel with great atmosphere

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: the little lounge at the top of the first set of stairs was seldom open
Positive_Review: The view from the bedroom the locality and the friendliness of the staff Phillppe who welcomed us in and looked after us was particularly helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: It was quite cold in the room even with a conditioner
Positive_Review: Very comfortable location Just in the centre Easy to go on foot to popular restaurants and places of interest

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: the room was small and most importantly had only one usable outlet these days people need to charge their phone camera ipad etc i found it very inconvenient to have only one outlet i know that they have plans to remodel hope the new facilities will match the great location
Positive_Review: great location booked a room with a view could see inside the Louvre from my window and the staff was very helpful and friendly

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: I found the outside of the hotel beautiful very old world building the interior left a lot to be desired in my opinion especially for what is to be a 5 star hotel Fell very far below the equally priced hotel I stayed at week prior in London which was also 5 star and centrally located
Positive_Review: Location was great directly across from the Louvre and central to most everything either on foot or the subway which is also right there

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room was spotless The bathroom taps were polished and the remote control was the cleanest I ve ever seen Comfy bed spacious room Pity I was there for only one night

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Not impressed by breakfast
Positive_Review: Comfortable rooms great service from the front desk and the concierge people Perfect location close to metro stop shopping sightseeing theaters and museums

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: There is a smell in the public areas that you would associate with old furniture
Positive_Review: Great location Just opposite the Louvre and in the middle of cafes and restaurants Nice building and comfortable rooms

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Smelled the mold in the room maybe because of the huminity Paris got too much rain this year
Positive_Review: The hotel staff are very nice and helpful The location is great

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I was delighted with the suite but what really impressed me was the staff If you want stuffy correct attitude then maybe look elsewhere If you prefer genuinely friendly people get it booked

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Size of the rooms too small View theres no view at all you look at roof TV too small a screen Room service over priced
Positive_Review: Two bottles of Evian per day Location par excellence Metro train connections

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel location is excellent The staff are very friendly and responsive They were very kind to send fruits and macarrons to our room after the check in and complementary water every day

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Perfect location The staff was extremely well trained very helpful and friendly A particular thanks to Hugo and Florence who helped me to solve a little problem which was no fault of the hotel Highly recommended

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Still wondering nothing to say
Positive_Review: Location of Hotel Paris attractions are near by this Location Easy to access the Metro Very friendly staffs they helped a lot Reasonable price to stay Looking forward to stay again for my upcoming travels to Paris Miss you guys

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Some wear and tear as an old and historic building could do with some renovations to rooms in the next few years
Positive_Review: Great location friendly staff frequent room service with turn down So close to local attractions and metro to go further afield too

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The bed was too hard Would prefer more of a variety at breakfast Also better care with making sure there are no insects in the room
Positive_Review: Loved the staff absolutely wonderful and extremely helpful Loved the location excellent and close to a metro station and all the other major touristic sites

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: the hotel is not quite completely renovated
Positive_Review: Great location The issues with the room were quickly acted upon By Florence Our experience was greatly enhanced

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The meal in the restaurant was ordinary at best and way too expensive compared to other meals we had at cafes and restaurants close to the hotel
Positive_Review: Access to all the venues we wanted to go to was great Service by the staff was terrific

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: We got married only two days ago and stayed there during our honeymoon I emailed twice about this but they completely ignored the enquiry I know bring newlyweds do not entitle us to special treatment but it would have been nice if they could acknowledge it in some dmall ways
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Well Our rooms air conditioning didn t work We called and maintenance came while we were out The fix was they left us a fan I m an understanding person and honestly after mentioning the air not working I didn t press further We just kept the windows open all night But when I m paying the nightly rates that this 5 star hotel charges I do expect air to work or to be moved to a room that does
Positive_Review: The staff was incredible I cannot express this enough So overwhelmingly kind and and understanding of our complete lack of knowledge of the French language Almost all spoke fluent English and didn t make us feel bad for not knowing French Upon arrival we were presented with a complimentary happy anniversary desert and a hand written letter from the staff manager A lot of care went into the service and it showed

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Despite being described on the website as air conditioned the room was not air conditioned They did move me to a different room which although not air conditioned was cooler The d cor was shabby and the carpets were worn particularly on the upper levels On checking in they required me to sign a permission which allowed them to withhold 1 600 from my bank account for 4 nights the price of the room and an extra 300 on top of the bill in case I had anything extra This was most unexpected and not at all evident at the time of booking or on their website To top it all they charged me an extra 320 which I only discovered when I got home and checked my bank account It seems that they charged me for one of the nights that my friend had stayed She was charged for 3 nights instead of 4 nights They said it was because I used my credit card to book the rooms but no one had mentioned it to me I had also made it crystal clear at check in that my friend and I would each pay our separate bills They have promised to refund this amount to me but it was all very stressful and an absolute mess
Positive_Review: The location is excellent

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Best place to stay center of the center of Paris we could travel by foot everywhere the staff are very helpfull and service oriented we highly recomend

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The only thing I did not like is that the building is an old one and you can hear the next room plumbing A few times I was sure I have water coming down on me from the floor above
Positive_Review: The staff was great attentive kind the rooms are clean the bathroom is great the soap is Fragonard room service is fast the food is excellent location is great

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Hugo the wonderful manager explained that the hotel is about to undergo extensive renovations this should make the stay wonderful
Positive_Review: My sister and I who travelled together are elderly but spry and healthy the staff looked after us so well we cannot be back soon enough to have some more of their wonderful caring service

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Eating there is expensive but many cafes in the area so not a problem
Positive_Review: An amazing piece of history Fantastic location and great room It has heaps of character and good quality

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Air quality in the room was unfortunately not good Had to keep windows open a lot which of course brings in a bit of noise
Positive_Review: Excellent staff very helpful and pleasant

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Older hotel which has been renovated however carpet could stand to be replaced
Positive_Review: Staff was very friendly and accommodating Upon check in we were offered a temporary room until our room which the hotel upgraded was ready We had just flown in internationally and were very tired so it helped to be able to take a nap freshen up and store our luggage until our room was ready One block from the Louvre

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The most comfortable hotel we have ever stayed in Turn of the century Parisienne Style It is so charming You ll love it if you re a romantic Its not your typical flashy Hyatt look elsewhere if thats you re thing The staff were fantastic and nothing was a problem Got to love Friday jazz down in the bar 10 10 Hotel du Louvre

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Nothing stood out for us as bad service
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was ideal for us The staff were friendly and helpful They arranged a boat cruise for us on the Seine with lunch which was excellent

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Vacation was too short I wish we could have stayed longer
Positive_Review: The welcone on arrival was wonderful Julie on reception went out of her way to ensure we had a great perfect room Every member of the team was pleasant happy and couldn t do enough to make sure you were ok I can t rate this hotel highly enough and it all stems from the amazing staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Our keycards for two rooms both decided to stop working at the same time My parents rang me to say their cards didn t work after having room service in my room I took my card with me and went over to their room and confirmed that their cards didn t let them in anymore I told them to wait in my room so I can ring them to see what s going on but when I tapped my card mine didn t work as well I was wearing shorts and my parents weren t appropriately dressed to go down to reception Luckily I had my mobile phone with me and the key cards have their hotel number to ring for help
Positive_Review: Conceirge was attentive and everything that s supposed to work work well

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Bar prices were obscene 12 for a single cup of tea and 52 for a glass of entry level single malt Makes the saving on the room irrelevant
Positive_Review: Excellent customer service nice hotel in a great location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Would benefit a lot from a a renovation that I believe is needed badly to this beautiful hotel
Positive_Review: Great location and very tentative employees to their guest

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The hotel was a little dated but they are going to be renovating soon I can t wait to see the updates
Positive_Review: The staff was very friendly and helpful They upgraded our room made a restaurant reservation printed out our tickets for The Louvre and just generally made our stay amazing We chose to pay a little extra for a room with a view and it was well worth it Our window overlooked a plaza between Conseil d tat Le Louvre des Antiquaires and The Louvre

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: that we didn t stay longer
Positive_Review: I travel extensively around the world for business and pleasure I was meeting my girlfriend in Paris for a late Valentine s day Birthday weekend I asked the hotel if they could get me half a dozen roses for the first night because we were celebrating Valentine s day then a week late and the next day her birthday They gave us a beautiful room with roses and the second night we got back to the room and there was a piece of cake that read Happy Birthday P S In terms of type of traveler we re between the young couple and mature couple range I love the staff THey were so accommodating This is my fourth time in Paris and the first time at the Hotel Du Louvre I will definitely stay at this hotel again

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The room was difficult to regulate temperature and the noise level due to location late at night was tough to get used to
Positive_Review: The staff was very friendly and most of them spoke enough English to be very helpful with recommendations directions etc the room was small but comfortable

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were fantastic They were so welcoming and definitely debunked the expectations of sassy French staff The hotel lobby was beautiful the room was quite spacious and comfortable and the staff did everything they could to make our stay memorable This hotel is a perfect location for a great trip to Paris We were only here for one night but were so central we could walk to see all of the sights

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: A kettle in the room would have been nice
Positive_Review: The location is superb for sightseeing with high quality cafe s and bars nearby The hotel is also directly opposite the Easy Bus airport transfer stop

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: tap in the bathroom was leaking water during my stay although they tried to fix it once but it kept leaking water the day after
Positive_Review: location interior design

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The hotel is in very poor condition not only that the floors are sloping which could be excused since the building is 150 years old But that carpets and bathroom tile are not maintained to a hygienic level is not acceptable
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Roof Room and on Louvre Museum street Side is Really Noisy Value for money it s just fine for a 4 stars level
Positive_Review: Location Staff Bed Quality

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The hotel is slightly old and lacks facilities such as swimming pool and large entrance hall AC cannot be well adjusted
Positive_Review: Location helpful staff excellent restaurant

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: We got in about 9 10 at night and usually would prefer to watch a movie to wind down so maybe more movie sports channels on the tv was a bit depressing watching the news as it was all about the Paris attacks and tension between Russia and Turkey English language I would read a book if I wanted subtitles
Positive_Review: Very helpful and friendly reception and helpdesk They gave us directions and types of sightseeing things to do and best mode of transportation as well Always asked us if we needed help with anything at every single time we walked past reception Umbrellas are available for use free of charge as it does rain a fair bit in this time of year

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Considering the cost of the room not to have tea or coffee making facilities was a let down only a small one though
Positive_Review: Location was great Metro station very close by Very helpful staff Excellent breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Expensive breakfast not worth it Arrived at 13hrs couldnt get the room untio 15hrs No late check out
Positive_Review: Excellent location Very nice room big bathroom very clean

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The TV was too old world and did not work Neither did the films one could pay for The systems need updating
Positive_Review: The hotel is wonderful old world and very beautiful It is perfectly located

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Showerhead constantly slipped minor problem
Positive_Review: Customer care Brasserie breakfast Receptioon one evening and chat with Hugo Maisher good exercise and customer relations

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: for a five star hotel I thought the lift and hallway and our room s bathroom were all a bit tired
Positive_Review: Location was fantastic and having the option of using the concierge or room service was nice though we didn t require either

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: On the other hand the hotel is very outdated and needs renovation urgently The rooms are old and cold The only reason the hotel gets a high score are the staff which really add a lot of value to the establishment The hotel is hardly worth its money even keeping in mind the location
Positive_Review: The hotel is located quite nicely but without any on site hotel parking Quite hard to drive to as can easily be missed The staff of the hotel are a charm and very helpful We got our room upgraded and some very polite assistance Wifi is quite fast

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: I was expecting more The room is bit old
Positive_Review: I was expecting a lot due to the price But the bed was huge and very comfortable the crib was good and the room was large Great location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Woke up the first morning to find there was no hot water Problem with a broken pipe was not rectified until the afternoon which prevented everyone from showering bathing When we checked out we asked if there was any adjustment to our bill for this huge problem they offered the Hyatt passport for any future stays at one of their hotels Not great considering it is after all a five star establishment
Positive_Review: Lovely comfortable hotel have stayed here before

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: We ran into a problem immediately with the bathroom The tub was old too high to get into and out of I am 5 tall and the bottom very slippery and shockingly no bar to hold onto anywhere We complained and the management attended to the problem immediately and installed a bar that was a huge improvement but not a real solution The tub is still too antiquated and inadequate as is the shower The carpeted floor was uneven and not as clean as it should have been The morning we left all the elevators in the hotel had broken down Evidently there are no service elevators
Positive_Review: The staff was very attentive pleasant and and helpful Linens and towels were changed daily Two terry cloth robes were supplied both huge OK for my husband who is 6 but not for me As we had requested our room was silent and generally comfortable No breakfast included Good pricey restaurant

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Very noisy area with to many cars and scooters which starts their activity earlier in the morning This Can easily be heard in the room
Positive_Review: Location close to Louvre

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: I don t like duvets I told Reception and they agreed I could have blankets if I make a request another time
Positive_Review: Spacious room good bathroom etc Friendly staff and pleasant interior of building

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: old carpet and facilities High value for old property with smiley sheets and old furniture Noise at night air conditioner wasn t working well Old design and small room Bad shower tub
Positive_Review: Location and view

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The executive room should prepare tea making pot in the first place However the room service staff did bring us the set after we asked for it
Positive_Review: This hotel offer us tickets to the Louver mus e with a fast entry passage which did a great help avoiding waiting in line and save us more time and energy to enjoy the treasures of the museum

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Not a bad hotel but certainly not worth the 500 euro I paid a night Small room no amenities no view somewhat dreary limited television channels Generally mediocre
Positive_Review: The location was fantastic

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Check in was challenging with poor communication about wait time until room was ready Concierge staff were not very friendly and seemed annoyed when asked for recommendations or questions
Positive_Review: Spacious and clean rooms Excellent location Helpful doormen

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: I booked the Hyatt Queen Room for our aniversary weekend away I was offered an upgrade to an executive room which i accepted and paid extra for We were dissapointed with the room especially the view from the window the run down decoration and noisy plumbing The room also lacked a trouser press Iron and board english speaking news channel on tv coffee or tea making facilitiies free bottled water and a poorly stocked mini bar The rest of the hotel was ok with the exception that it had no tourist information around We never used the hotel for breakfast so no comment I have travelled all over the world and in my mind this is not worthy of a 5 star hotel more 3 at best Hotel is well over priced beware of the bar prices and water from the mini bar is 7 euro for 30cl Its a great location with local attractions at your toes
Positive_Review: The location and Staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Condition of the hotel is poor it needs a full renovation Very poor sound insulation between rooms This hotel is nowhere near five star as advertised It is a low four star at best and HYATT should not allow their name to be used in such a way it greatly devalues the brand
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly efficient and polite Excellent service

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Some of the rooms need an upgrade Some of the staff could be more helpful
Positive_Review: They are getting better with service Mr Mohamed at the entrance is always the kindest most elegant and helpful Mme Florence at customer service was very kind too Having great key people at a Hotel makes the whole experience superior The beds are always incredibly comfortable and the internet is reliable The quality of the room service was better than ever The location is outstanding Overall the Hotel seems to keep getting better

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Rude staff incapable conscience they managed to lost our luggage which we left for safekeeping for 2 hours Finally they found it only because I had to go look for it since they left it untagged But it kept getting worse The people at the conscience probably couldn t understand English as There was a problem with the payment they agreed to get paid in cash and then wouldn t accept it The general manager apologized and promised to make it up to us by making our stay memorable Needless to say we neither saw or heard from him again It s like the first five star hotel I ve been to where they make the customer feel invisible and irrelevant Shame That s all I have to say
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fabulous location the staff very friendly and helpful We had a view of the louvre museum from our room It was our first visit to Paris and thanks to the hotel we will return

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: We booked a courtyard side room as it was less expensive and we thought it would be quieter than the street side rooms What a mistake The courtyard houses the hotel s generators and was so noisy it was like sleeping next to a factory It was impossible to open the window and even with the window closed the noise was inescapable The hotel staff were unsympathetic and made no attempt to provide an alternative or to compensate us in any way Our room was undistinguished with poor quality toiletries no tea coffee making facilities room service tea is chaged at 10 euros and no complimentary water All in all over priced and certainly not good value for money I would have expected much more from a hotel that calls itself the oldest luxury hotel in Paris If you stay here avoid at all costs the courtyard side rooms unless you are hard of hearing
Positive_Review: The hotel is a few minutes from the Louvre

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: pokey bedroom in need of renovation having to ask for toiletries and toilet paper to be replenished Thet were having a laugh with room service and breakfast prices poor value for money
Positive_Review: The central location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Dated Hotel in need of major refurbishment The cleanliness of the hotel also in some areas needed attention
Positive_Review: Staff at the hotel were excellent Location was very central and within easy access to both the metro and many of the landmarks Service was good

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The furniture in our room was a bit worn but this was just an aesthetic Everything worked properly
Positive_Review: Location location location Staff provided excellent excellent service and new the area well The room was small but adequate with fab bathroom Id recommend future guests read up on the Baron Eugene Haussmann as the surrounding area remains an excellent example of his overall grand theme for Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fell ill during visit Hotel staff exstreamly helpful calling doctors and takinf care of my wife Extended our stay with an extreamly generous discount A top notch hotel

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: For a 5 hotel it would have been nice to have a complimentary bottle of water for each night stayed rather than the one provided at start of the stay The hotel would also benefit from having spa beauty facilities to help with the aches and pains from all the walking undertaken whilst taking in the sights I was also slightly surprised by the sharp increase in the bar tariff from the terrace bar to the bar lounge
Positive_Review: The location of this hotel is fantastic however overall it lacked the attention to detail you would expect for a 5 rating The staff especially the concierge were extremely helpful however on occasion we felt rushed to finish our drinks snacks by some staff at the terrace bar despite it not being overly busy The free wifi was a welcome feature

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Standard room was a bit small and not so clean So it is a bit expensive for the standard room
Positive_Review: Staff were great and very friendly Also they provided a wheelchair for my father for all his stay Corner Suit was so big and nice

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Had to ask 3 times for the heater to be switched on in the Terrace Brasserie otherwise no problems
Positive_Review: Location excellent Staff very friendly Very comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The rooms are small and overall it looks like the hotel has not been renovated for awhile
Positive_Review: Excellent location Breakfast not included a plus as there are so many nice places to eat in Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: The walls were paper thin which meant you could hear everything from all the rooms around you The staff believed in shouting down the corridors until late at night to starting again at 6AM on the dot every morning Most of the guests were no better
Positive_Review: As we were looking for better accomodations than we had last year near the Louvre this seemed ideal So the location was fine

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: Only one chair in our double room an extra chair and also coffee tea making facilities in the room would have made it an even better stay
Positive_Review: Location very helpful pleasant staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: My card was charged before I arrived even though it clearly stated my card was for guarantee only which lead to me taking to many euros as I planned to pay cash The room was not to the standard I expected or reflective off the price I payed it was small no natural light or view majority off the features of the room were tired and needed updating Staines on the carpets overall not a nice place to be
Positive_Review: Friendly staff concierge were excellent it was our first time visiting Paris and they were really helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Negative_Review: We didn t get maid service on the day before we left Not a problem but I was surprised
Positive_Review: The staff went above and beyond my expectations Especially when leaving early in the morning They helped us to the taxi and looked up our flight to be sure the driver knew where to take us

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt
